title: Saving Leilaka: Han Storm: The Chronicles of Han:
description: "When oblivion is threatened, drastic measures are engaged upon to negate the event, or alleviate losses to the minimum. With the original seeding ground for all Life in grave peril, The Creator sends in his most devoted servant.I am Han, and this is my life memory . . . "Han has to save Leilaka in order to save himself. For the first time in his existence, Han is presented with the choice to stay a servant-god, or become human. Does Han have enough time to make such a soul-decision?Available directly from author at www.chroniclesofhan.comList of subjects covered in the Saving Leilaka Adventure: Healer Guides and
